title: 820-3209 intermittent wifi
message:
INTERMITTENT OPERATION, SOMETIMES WORKS WELL, AND THEN APPEARS AS NOT INSTALLED HARDWARE,
I already changed the wifi card for another and the same problem appears
some story: change the component u3800 and C3800 for another due corrosion

title: 820-3209 intermittent wifi
message:
Inspect U4002 area for corrosion.
Post its voltages; when wifi is not dertected.
